metadata.synopsis: Player has opened the cursed iron flask, releasing the creature within, which is hostile to everyone, party included.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: What the hells - there was a creature trapped inside.
0.context: NodeContext: Wyll line: almost saying "oh shit and cuts himself off.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: That thing doesn't look too happy to be free.
1.context: NodeContext: Karlach: Like talking to an angry dog trying to soothe it (but it could be any kind of creature)
